tweets.text: Also appalled. The cause of the hazardous fumes is greed& money @RedIndustries2 . And the inability to stop it comes down to insufficient money. What happened in parliament yesterday @AaronBell4NUL ? This is way over the @EnvAgency  s head now @DefraGovUK #StopTheStink https://t.co/sgnXdPotEu

@HelenVi00175623 @SianieRoo @EnvAgency @JamesBevanEA @Cap_it_off @Feargal_Sharkey @PHE_uk @DefraGovUK @StinkStopthe @ChrisGPackham Oh don't get me started on that topic! Right now though, I genuinely think the @RedIndustries2 Walleys Quarry disaster is the most urgent in the country. And I  imagine it's a wildlife as well as a human one.

24 leaky dams in various styles, recently completed nr Troutbeck. Huge thanks to Rob at #arbclear. Part of Glenderamackin NFM project. #slowtheflow. Funded by #weg and @EnvAgencyNW https://t.co/jqq1M0xyMb

@sunnyraisin62 @StinkStopthe @SianieRoo @Cap_it_off @EnvAgencyMids @EnvAgency @JamesBevanEA @ClareDinnisEA Wouldn't you think that the people in @EnvAgencyMids and @daera_ni could work this out themselves? There should be record logs of what the operators do every day and night. Inspectors should be checking everything day and night! @Mullaghglass123 @StinkStopthe @edwinpootsmla

@sunnyraisin62 @StinkStopthe @SianieRoo @Cap_it_off @EnvAgencyMids @EnvAgency @JamesBevanEA @ClareDinnisEA @daera_ni @Mullaghglass123 @edwinpootsmla When these landfills are closed down, there needs to be public inquiries to find out the truth of what has gone on! @Mullaghglass123 @StinkStopthe #Accountability

@HelenVi00175623 @SianieRoo @EnvAgency @JamesBevanEA @Cap_it_off @Feargal_Sharkey @PHE_uk @DefraGovUK @StinkStopthe Yep. There's also been a spate of instances of wanton destruction of wildlife and habitat, followed by EA intervention, followed by some shrugging of shoulders. The Carbis Bay Hotel cutting down a swath of coastal woodland to host a G7 summit on climate change, for example.

@SianieRoo @EnvAgency @JamesBevanEA @Cap_it_off What? Not enough money to robustly monitor a landfill site? This gets worse! Governments can find money if they really want to! This is a health and environmental disaster! @BorisJohnson @MattHancock

tweets.text: @Janeclaremotram @LFC_Jacqui @seftoncouncil @EnvAgencyNW Hi all, It’s important we talk about how we’re tackling flooding in #Sefton, which is a major concern for many.  This project nears the stage of returning the area back to local residents so it’s important we work together to leave a space behind for the community to enjoy. (1/2)
@uugroupplc @LFC_Jacqui @seftoncouncil @EnvAgencyNW Disgusted at the complete disregard of this tweet, it feels like uu are sticking 2 fingers up and publicly mocking us, was this the intention?
@Robbie_Watt @forestryhour @EnvAgency There's no easy solutions, but #carbonoffsetting schemes can be found listed on the @EagleIntermedia #environmental statement page at https://t.co/luBj9wSgEv

The @EnvAgency @JamesBevanEA definitely need more money, they’re saying they’ve no money to monitor the landfill longer term - we’ve not even solved the fumes yet so this is v v concerning! I don’t buy the due diligence tho, he was already known to them @Cap_it_off #stopthestink https://t.co/O0evVeHSDu

@BenM_Anderson @EnvAgency @JamesBevanEA @Cap_it_off Good grief to the raw sewage, since this issue have been shocked to how many huge environmental issues there in the UK! I don’t think the @EnvAgency get to just say they have no money to fix it either. They’re a government agency - there is a structure&hierarchy! #stopthestink

urls.title: Environment Agency launches new flooding Action Plan
urls.description: The Environment Agency's FCERM Strategy Action Plan will help to better protect over hundreds of thousands more homes and businesses in the years ahead.

tweets.text: 1/4 We're working with our members #internaldrainageboards and other #flood risk management authorities to contribute to England's new #FloodActionPlan launched by @EnvAgency today https://t.co/Fv509gb6fc

@SianieRoo @EnvAgency @JamesBevanEA @Cap_it_off Yes, that is probably a combination of things (tho don't underestimate the power of doing the easy thing when there is no time). What is happening in Silverdale is not isolated either. There's raw sewage going into a river in Cornwall, not to mention the landfill issues elsewhere

@SianieRoo @StinkStopthe @Cap_it_off @EnvAgencyMids @EnvAgency @JamesBevanEA @ClareDinnisEA I know nothing about landfills just what I read online but I bet it's the built-up gas being released from the gas wells. If they don't have a way to process the gas it has to go somewhere or you'd imagine it would explode. So they inflict it on people to inhale.

We can now see it’s not the @EnvAgency being scared of an orphaned site , they’re scared of footing the bill to restore it . It’s a case of The EA with no money , red with no interest and us in the middle with no quality of life . @StinkStopthe

urls.title: Satellite measurements of air quality and greenhouse gases: application to regulatory activities
urls.description: Investigates how satellite measurements of air pollutants and greenhouse gases could be applied to the Environment Agency’s regulatory activities.

tweets.text:
New report by @EnvAgency with contributions from @NCEOscience available on Satellite measurements of air quality and greenhouse gases: application to regulatory activities

urls.title: Secretary of State appointed vacancies for the Environment Agency Boar
urls.description: Recently Government announced the Secretary of State, working closely with the Chair of the Environment Agency, is seeking to appoint three new members to the Board of the Environment Agency. Applications are encouraged by 2 June.

tweets.text:
Three new exciting opportunities to become a member of the @EnvAgency board are available, to find out more and apply click below 🏞️⬇️ @NFUtweets @NFUPolitical  
https://t.co/1M05DSAAia

Flood Re shares the ambitions within the @EnvAgency's FCERM Strategy and will be working closely with @BritishInsurers and @BIBAbroker to develop a specialist directory of brokers & insurers to help customers who otherwise find it difficult to get flood insurance #FCERMStrategy https://t.co/cfTmaFdBwG

Yes - so much more than an ‘odour’ - irritates me to keep hearing that word as if it’s just a slightly inconvenient whiff. It’s poisonous landfill gas causing unbearable health effects on a daily basis @Cap_it_off @StinkStopthe #stopthestink @EnvAgency https://t.co/vpSObEHFeY

@RichmondRector @LBRUT @EnvAgency @metpoliceuk @ClarenceHouse @churchofengland Thank you for making this clear.  One of your elderly parishioners was in despair this morning. So was I! One of my favourite peaceful stopping places.

tweets.text: At the Lower Otter Restoration Project yesterday with @ocelotnick & @harrybartonDWT: a £15m scheme over 150 hectares to adapt to #climatechange + create a #wildlife reserve including saltmarsh & mudflats providing habitat for wading birds, reedbed & grazing marsh. https://t.co/ANlFuudIfM

urls.title: The RNLI reflects on the tragic plight of the minke whale
urls.description: After yesterday's tragic ending to the story of the minke whale trapped in the Thames, the RNLI reflect on the whale's story.

tweets.text:
"Every so often a story such as this is driven by the emotions as much as the facts." Thank you to all the rescue teams who worked tirelessly to help the whale and to @rnli_teddington for this reflective piece. @RNLI @BDMLR @EnvAgency @metpoliceuk
https://t.co/9Du3EeJEUr

urls.title: 2021_Urban Wetlands_FINAL[125594].pdf
urls.description: The Zoological Society of London (ZSL) is a charity devoted to the worldwide conservation of animals and their habitats. Visit London Zoo and Whipsnade Zoo.

tweets.text:
Today with our partners➡️@Thames21, @MiddlesexUni, #GLA, @SE_Rivers_Trust, @EnvAgency, @EnfieldCouncil⬅️we are launching our Urban Wetland Design Guide, funded by the Greater London Authority

Click the link below to access⬇️
